1: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Again the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> דַּבֵּ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to the children</n> עַמְּךָ֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>upon</n> אֶ֕רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon a land</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> אָבִ֥יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto them When I bring</n> עָלֶ֖יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> וְלָקְח֨וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>if the people</n> הָאָ֜רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> אִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אֶחָד֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>a</n> מִקְצֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>7097 </sup> <n>of their coasts</n> וְנָתְנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and set</n> אֹת֛וֹ <sup>853 </sup> לָהֶ֖ם לְצֹפֶֽה׃ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>him for their watchman</n>
3: וְרָאָ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>If when he seeth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> בָּאָ֣ה <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the land</n> וְתָקַ֥ע <sup>8628 </sup> <n>he blow</n> בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>the trumpet</n> וְהִזְהִ֥יר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>and warn</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n>
4: וְשָׁמַ֨ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Then whosoever</n> הַשֹּׁמֵ֜עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heareth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ק֤וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the sound</n> הַשּׁוֹפָר֙ <sup>7782 </sup> <n>of the trumpet</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> נִזְהָ֔ר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>and taketh not warning</n> וַתָּ֥בוֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>if the sword</n> וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and take him away</n> דָּמ֥וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>his blood</n> בְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>shall be upon his own head</n> יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
5: אֵת֩ <sup>853 </sup> ק֨וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the sound</n> הַשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>of the trumpet</n> שָׁמַע֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>He heard</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> נִזְהָ֔ר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>and took not warning</n> דָּמ֖וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>his blood</n> בּ֣וֹ יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נִזְהָ֖ר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>shall be upon him But he that taketh warning</n> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n> מִלֵּֽט׃ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>shall deliver</n>
6: וְ֠הַצֹּפֶה <sup>6822 </sup> <n>But if the watchman</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> יִרְאֶ֨ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>see</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֶ֜רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> בָּאָ֗ה <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> תָקַ֤ע <sup>8628 </sup> <n>and blow</n> בַּשּׁוֹפָר֙ <sup>7782 </sup> <n>not the trumpet</n> וְהָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and the people</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> נִזְהָ֔ר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>be not warned</n> וַתָּב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>if the sword</n> וַתִּקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and take</n> מֵהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> נָ֑פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[any] person</n> ה֚וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in his iniquity</n> נִלְקָ֔ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>from among them he is taken away</n> וְדָמ֖וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>but his blood</n> מִיַּֽד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> הַצֹּפֶ֥ה <sup>6822 </sup> <n>at the watchman's</n> אֶדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>will I require</n> ס
7: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>So thou O son</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> צֹפֶ֥ה <sup>6822 </sup> <n>thee a watchman</n> נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I have set</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>therefore thou shalt hear</n> מִפִּי֙ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>at my mouth</n> דָּבָ֔ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>and warn</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
8: בְּאָמְרִ֣י <sup>559 </sup> <n>When I say</n> לָרָשָׁ֗ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>unto the wicked</n> רָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>O wicked</n> מ֣וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[man] thou shalt surely</n> תָּמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> דִבַּ֔רְתָּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>if thou dost not speak</n> לְהַזְהִ֥יר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>to warn</n> רָשָׁ֖ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>from his way</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> רָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>that wicked</n> בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in his iniquity</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[man] shall die</n> וְדָמ֖וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>but his blood</n> מִיָּדְךָ֥ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at thine hand</n> אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>will I require</n>
9: וְ֠אַתָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>your part</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> הִזְהַ֨רְתָּ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>Nevertheless if thou warn</n> רָשָׁ֤ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> מִדַּרְכּוֹ֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>of his way</n> לָשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>to turn</n> מִמֶּ֔נָּה <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> שָׁ֖ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>from it if he do not turn</n> מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>from his way</n> ה֚וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in his iniquity</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall die</n> וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>your part</n> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>thy soul</n> הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>but thou hast delivered</n> ס
10: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Therefore O thou son</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> אֱמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כֵּ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אֲמַרְתֶּם֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus ye speak</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> פְשָׁעֵ֥ינוּ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>If our transgressions</n> וְחַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>and our sins</n> עָלֵ֑ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וּבָ֛ם אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> נְמַקִּ֖ים <sup>4743 </sup> <n>[be] upon us and we pine away</n> וְאֵ֥יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> נִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>in them how should we then live</n>
11: אֱמֹ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Say</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>unto them [As] I live</n> אָ֣נִי ׀ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>no</n> אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>I have no pleasure</n> בְּמ֣וֹת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>in the death</n> הָרָשָׁ֔ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>no</n> בְּשׁ֥וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turn</n> רָשָׁ֛ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>but that the wicked</n> מִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>from his way</n> וְחָיָ֑ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and live</n> שׁ֣וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turn</n> שׁ֜וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>ye turn</n> מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֧ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>ways</n> הָרָעִ֛ים <sup>7451 </sup> <n>ye from your evil</n> וְלָ֥מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> תָמ֖וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>for why will ye die</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>O house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> פ
12: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Therefore thou son</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> אֱמֹ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> עַמְּךָ֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> צִדְקַ֣ת <sup>6666 </sup> <n>The righteousness</n> הַצַּדִּ֗יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>of the righteous</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תַצִּילֶ֙נּוּ֙ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>shall not deliver</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>him in the day</n> פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>of his transgression</n> וְרִשְׁעַ֤ת <sup>7564 </sup> <n>as for the wickedness</n> הָֽרָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>he will not</n> יִכָּ֣שֶׁל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>he shall not fall</n> בָּ֔הּ בְּי֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thereby in the day</n> שׁוּב֣וֹ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>that he turneth</n> מֵֽרִשְׁע֑וֹ <sup>7562 </sup> <n>from his wickedness</n> וְצַדִּ֗יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>neither shall the righteous</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יוּכַ֛ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>be able</n> לִֽחְי֥וֹת <sup>2421 </sup> <n>to live</n> בָּ֖הּ בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for his [righteousness] in the day</n> חֲטֹאתֽוֹ׃ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>that he sinneth</n>
13: בְּאָמְרִ֤י <sup>559 </sup> <n>When I shall say</n> לַצַּדִּיק֙ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>to the righteous</n> חָיֹ֣ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>[that] he shall surely</n> יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n> וְהֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בָטַ֥ח <sup>982 </sup> <n>if he trust</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> צִדְקָת֖וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>to his own righteousness</n> וְעָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and commit</n> עָ֑וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> [צִדְקָתֹו כ] (צִדְקֹתָיו֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>his righteousness</n> ק) לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <sup>2142 </sup> <n>shall not be remembered</n> וּבְעַוְל֥וֹ <sup>5766 </sup> <n>but for his iniquity</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>of his which</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath committed</n> בּ֥וֹ יָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall die</n>
14: וּבְאָמְרִ֥י <sup>559 </sup> <n>Again when I say</n> לָֽרָשָׁ֖ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>unto the wicked</n> מ֣וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>Thou shalt surely</n> תָּמ֑וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> וְשָׁב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>if he turn</n> מֵֽחַטָּאת֔וֹ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>from his sin</n> וְעָשָׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>that which is lawful</n> וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and right</n>
15: חֲבֹ֨ל <sup>2258 </sup> <n>the pledge</n> יָשִׁ֤יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>restore</n> רָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>[If] the wicked</n> גְּזֵלָ֣ה <sup>1500 </sup> <n>that he had robbed</n> יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>give again</n> בְּחֻקּ֤וֹת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>in the statutes</n> הַֽחַיִּים֙ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of life</n> הָלַ֔ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> לְבִלְתִּ֖י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>without</n> עֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>without committing</n> עָ֑וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> חָי֥וֹ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall not die</n>
16: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>sin</n> ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> חָטָ֔א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>that he hath committed</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִזָּכַ֖רְנָה <sup>2142 </sup> <n>shall be mentioned</n> ל֑וֹ מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>that which is lawful</n> וּצְדָקָ֛ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and right</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto him he hath done</n> חָי֥וֹ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n>
17: וְאָמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Yet the children</n> עַמְּךָ֔ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> יִתָּכֵ֖ן <sup>8505 </sup> <n>is not equal</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>The way</n> אֲדֹנָ֑י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> וְהֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> דַּרְכָּ֥ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>but as for them their way</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> יִתָּכֵֽן׃ <sup>8505 </sup> <n>is not equal</n>
18: בְּשׁוּב־ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turneth</n> צַדִּ֥יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>When the righteous</n> מִצִּדְקָת֖וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>from his righteousness</n> וְעָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and committeth</n> עָ֑וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> וּמֵ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall even die</n> בָּהֶֽם׃
